clintock:Adenine.NAME: Adenine
clintock:Adenine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Adenine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:Alkylation.NAME: Alkylation
clintock:Alkylation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke each Pyrimidine orb X+1 times.

clintock:ATPReserves.NAME: ATP Reserves
clintock:ATPReserves.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted this battle (Exhausted !M! cards).
clintock:ATPReserves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted this battle (Exhausted 1 card).

clintock:BaseSynthesis.NAME: Base Synthesis
clintock:BaseSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Nucleobase to your hand.

clintock:BoloPunch.NAME: Bolo Punch
clintock:BoloPunch.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random Amino-Acid to your Peptide-Chain.

clintock:BruteForce.NAME: Brute Force
clintock:BruteForce.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. Gain 1 Phosphate for each Weakened enemy.

clintock:Centrifuge.NAME: Centrifuge
clintock:Centrifuge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Add a random Nucleobase to your hand for each enemy remaining.

clintock:Chromosome.NAME: Chromosome
clintock:Chromosome.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the number of Chromosome pairs needed to complete the Genome Project. Exhaust.

clintock:CompostBin.NAME: Compost Bin
clintock:CompostBin.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Phosphate equal to twice its cost.
clintock:CompostBin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Phosphate equal to three times its cost.

clintock:Cytosine.NAME: Cytosine
clintock:Cytosine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Cytosine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:DegradedPrimer.NAME: Degraded Primer
clintock:DegradedPrimer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each Bound Nucleobase, apply !M! Poison.

clintock:Deoxyadenosine.NAME: Deoxyadenosine
clintock:Deoxyadenosine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Bind 1 Adenine.

clintock:Deoxycytidine.NAME: Deoxycytidine
clintock:Deoxycytidine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Bind 1 Cytosine.

clintock:Deoxyguanosine.NAME: Deoxyguanosine
clintock:Deoxyguanosine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Next turn, gain !M! Energy. NL Bind 1 Guanine.

clintock:DnaMicroarray.NAME: DNA Microarray
clintock:DnaMicroarray.DESCRIPTION: Add all four Nucleobases to your hand. Exhaust.

clintock:Efflux.NAME: Efflux
clintock:Efflux.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you Bound a Nucleobase this turn, draw 1 card.

clintock:EnergyMetabolism.NAME: Energy Metabolism
clintock:EnergyMetabolism.DESCRIPTION: Lose X HP. NL Gain X Energy. NL Draw X cards. NL Exhaust.
clintock:EnergyMetabolism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose X HP. NL Gain X Energy. NL Draw X cards.

clintock:Eureka.NAME: Eureka!
clintock:Eureka.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If you draw a Power, gain !M! Fluorophore.
clintock:Eureka.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If you draw a Power, gain !M! Fluorophores.

clintock:GeneticPollution.NAME: Genetic Pollution
clintock:GeneticPollution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've generated a Nonessential Amino-Acid, apply !M! Poison.

clintock:GlucoseToxicity.NAME: Glucose Toxicity
clintock:GlucoseToxicity.DESCRIPTION: Lose half of your Sugar. Apply that much Poison.

clintock:Guanine.NAME: Guanine
clintock:Guanine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Guanine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:Immunodeficiency.NAME: Immunodeficiency
clintock:Immunodeficiency.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

clintock:Interrupt.NAME: Interrupt
clintock:Interrupt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an Intron into your draw pile.

clintock:Intron.NAME: Intron
clintock:Intron.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Nucleobases cannot Bind this turn.

clintock:Ketosis.NAME: Ketosis
clintock:Ketosis.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL For each Bound Guanine or Thymine, deal !D! damage.

clintock:Knockout.NAME: Knockout
clintock:Knockout.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Nucleobases cannot evoke this turn.

clintock:MendelPro.NAME: MendelPRO
clintock:MendelPro.DESCRIPTION: Sequencer. Whenever you Bind a Nucleobase, draw !M! card.
clintock:MendelPro.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sequencer. NL Whenever you Bind a Nucleobase, draw !M! cards.

clintock:MetabolicPathways.NAME: Metabolic Pathways
clintock:MetabolicPathways.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, NL gain !M! Block.

clintock:MineAndDine.NAME: Mine and Dine
clintock:MineAndDine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Sugar and !M! Phosphate.

clintock:Nanopore.NAME: Nanopore
clintock:Nanopore.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random Nucleobase to your hand.

clintock:Outbreak.NAME: Outbreak
clintock:Outbreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies (and apply !M! Vulnerable if you've generated a Nonessential Amino-Acid).

clintock:Polymerize.NAME: Polymerize
clintock:Polymerize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you Bound a Nucleobase this turn, gain !B! Block again.

clintock:ProteinUtilization.NAME: Protein Utilization
clintock:ProteinUtilization.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've generated an Essential Amino-Acid, target ALL enemies.

clintock:PurineMetabolism.NAME: Purine Metabolism
clintock:PurineMetabolism.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Purine orb.

clintock:RandomForest.NAME: Random Forest
clintock:RandomForest.DESCRIPTION: Randomly gain X NL of one of the following: Strength, Dexterity, or Fluorophores. Exhaust.
clintock:RandomForest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X NL of ALL of the following: Strength, Dexterity, and Fluorophores. Exhaust.

clintock:Recombination.NAME: Recombination
clintock:Recombination.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle a Knockout into your draw pile.

clintock:Replenish.NAME: Replenish
clintock:Replenish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Sugar. NL Gain !M! Phosphate.
clintock:Replenish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Sugars. NL Gain !M! Phosphates.

clintock:SampleSwap.NAME: Sample Swap
clintock:SampleSwap.DESCRIPTION: Swap Sugar and Phosphate amounts. Exhaust.

clintock:SinsheimerT3.NAME: SinsheimerT3
clintock:SinsheimerT3.DESCRIPTION: Sequencer. NL Whenever you Bind a Nucleobase, gain !M! Energy.

clintock:SuperSeqX1.NAME: SuperSeq X1
clintock:SuperSeqX1.DESCRIPTION: Sequencer. NL At the start of each turn, apply a random Amino-Acid.

clintock:TelomereErosion.NAME: Telomere Erosion
clintock:TelomereErosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, draw !M! cards.

clintock:TheGenomeProject.NAME: The Genome Project
clintock:TheGenomeProject.DESCRIPTION: Add 23 Chromosome pairs to your discard pile. Exhaust them all to deal !M! damage to NL ALL enemies.

clintock:Thymine.NAME: Thymine
clintock:Thymine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Thymine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:Thymidine.NAME: Thymidine
clintock:Thymidine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Bind 1 Thymine.

clintock:VectorFlow.NAME: Vector Flow
clintock:VectorFlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [R] for each Nucleobase Bound this turn.
